Problem 2.	Write a SQL query to find the names and salaries of the employees that have a salary that is up to 
10% higher than the minimal salary for the company.

SELECT DISTINCT FirstName, LastName, Salary, Salary*0.1+Salary AS 'Bonus'
FROM Employees
WHERE Salary>9900
